name: elab3
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, cab(s0, w0)), w1), wi(w1, wcel(c0, universe)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cab(s0, w0)), w1)
-| wi(w1, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(wi(w1, wcel(c0, universe)), wb(wcel(c0, cab(s0, w0)), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cab(s0, w0)), w1)
-| wi(w1, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(wi(w1, wcel(c0, universe)), wb(wcel(c0, cab(s0, w0)), w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w1, wcel(c0, universe)), wb(wcel(c0, cab(s0, w0)), w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cab(s0, w0)), w1)
-| wi(w1, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Membership in a class abstraction using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2000.)
